TrackDescription: Po-Chun Speedway is a short track (41.551m) featuring a simple oval track paired with a dragstrip, and single hairpin. It is named in honor of the 2020 AWS DeepRacer League Champion from NCTU CGI Taiwan.

Po-Chun Super Speedway is a long track (59.233m) which adds back-to-back hairpins and a high speed right angle turn its short track counterpart. It is named in honor of the 2020 AWS DeepRacer League Champion from NCTU CGI Taiwan.
